description: Rab's definitive winter mountaineering pant for pushing your limits in winter alpine conditions. Using mid-weight bonded Matrix™ softshell, this pant is protective, windproof and offers impressive freedom of movement for extreme mountain terrain. A replacement for their popular Spire Pants.
name: Rab Ascendor Alpine Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: Matrix™ 2 layer bonded softshell fabric - 235 g
